detail_desc: Kangol x H&M. Double-layered, knitted hat with a pompom on top. Wide turn-up at the hem with the Kangol logo on the front.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and slits in the sides.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, short sleeves, elastication in the sides of the top layer and a gentle flare to the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with sewn-in turn-ups.
Cotton chambray cap with embroidery on the front and concealed elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved top in glittery, lightweight slub jersey with crossover straps at the back.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Detachable tie belt at the waist.
Leggings with soft elastication at the waist and extra room for a growing tummy.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed smocking at the hems.

Short dress in cotton poplin with a square neckline and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication, a gathered seam under the bust, smocking at the back and a gently flared skirt with pockets in the side seams. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Longer shirt in a crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a soft, detachable belt with metal rings, and buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless, V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip at the back, seam under the bust and gathered seams around the skirt for added volume. Lined.
Joggers in soft velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with foldover ribbing at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, jersey-lined, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini top with short frilled sleeves, a wrapover front with decorative frills and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Decorative ties at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Boat-neck jumper in a fine knit with buttons on the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Toe-post mules in imitation leather with square toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5 cm.

Short top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Tailored jacket in a stretch cotton weave with a stand-up collar, decorative shoulder tabs and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, buttoned cuffs and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
Rib-knit vest top with a deep V-neck front and back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in washed twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable tie belt at the waist and no buttons.
Lined, non-wired bikini top. Wide shoulder straps with a decorative ring, and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Trainers in imitation suede with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Height of sole approx. 3.5 cm.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Earrings in various sizes and designs. Length 1-5.5 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with open sides and heel straps with covered elastication. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in a linen blend with a collar, deep V-neck and decorative diagonal buttoning down the front. Short, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, patterned knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short, round-necked dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves. Frills at the top that continue back over the shoulders, a seam at the waist and a decorative scalloped trim at the hem. Unlined.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft knit.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with visible seams at the front, a high waist with decorative buttons at the top, and a visible zip at the back. Side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x210 cm.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Suit trousers in twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.
Fitted vest top in microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders and at the lower back. Stand-up collar with a press-stud, and a zip down the front. Zipped chest and front pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.

Cylindrical sports bag in woven fabric with a text print. Adjustable shoulder strap with a metal carabiner hook at one end, two handles and a zip at the top. Two mesh compartments on one short side and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size 25x40 cm.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band in metal decorated with a braided satin ribbon.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with buttons at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin dance shoes with crossover elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and short chain with a surfboard-shaped pendant.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in a soft weave with concealed buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt and pleats for extra width. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders, short, raglan flutter sleeves, and a rounded hem. Loose fit.
Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a large appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved top in a soft, fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.

Shorter-style blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a drawstring at the hem. Gathered yoke at the back and long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Long, multi-strand necklace with pendants. Adjustable length, 81-120 cm.
